articles.title: Stimac requests PM Modi's intervention after Indian football snubbed for Asiad - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Indian football team head coach Igor Stimac said that the reasons to not send the team for the Asian Games are “unjust” | Football News
articles.content: The Indian football team is expected to miss the Sports Ministry's criteria to be included in the contingent that will represent the country at the 2022 Asian Games in Huangzhou, China. The ministry … [+3803 chars]
